entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whitehorse Airport 11:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.5°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.9°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
